name: 陳錦文
objective:
本課程在透過一系列每週一次的專家研討會讓學生了解有機材料領域的最新發展和前沿研究。每場會議都將邀請傑出學者、產業領袖和外部專家發表演講，為學生提供有機材料科學與工程領域的先進技術、創新應用和新興趨勢的見解。
This course is designed to expose students to the latest developments and cutting-edge research in the field of organic materials through a series of weekly expert seminars. Each session will feature invited talks primarily delivered by distinguished scholars, industry leaders, and external experts, providing students with insights into advanced technologies, innovative applications, and emerging trends in organic material science and engineering.
